game.name: Rainbow Pancake Cooking
game.description:
It is really exciting to spend the whole day in the kitchen, especially for our cute princess Sofia, who has planned today to try out a new pancake recipe. Are you able to help her out in preparing a rainbow coloured pancake cake? The key to win this free online cooking game for girls is to follow the instructions properly. This will ensure to create a perfect breakfast that is delicious and colourful. Grab all the needful ingredients off the shelves and move to the home to play this popular Rainbow Pancake Cooking game. 

Make sure that you follow all the instructions step-by-step to make this incredibly yummy dessert. This brand new cooking game is for kids, teens and grown-ups who love cooking and are passionate for Sofia, our popular heroine from the Disney Junior animated series. In this first place, you will have to create some extremely delicious pancakes. Although the task is pretty difficult, paying attention to the depth details to complete the game successfully. 

The princess Sofia trusts on your powers, so please do not make her feel down. Show off your culinary skills and cook the cupcakes which look like a rainbow. Sofia is there to help you out. Follow her indications step-by-step and prepare the best pancakes of your life using the mouse. Prepare the mixture using eggs, milk, sugar and some more ingredients. Put them on the try on the stove. Add some colors to pancakes to make them look like a rainbow.
